sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search', templateUrl: './search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search.component.css'], }) export class SearchComponent { searchQuery: string = ''; searchType: string = 'artist'; search(): void { console.log('Search Query:', this.searchQuery); console.log('Search Type:', this.searchType); } }
